artist: Artist: Taguchi Beisaku; Publisher: Inoue Kichijirō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: vertical ōban triptych; triptych forming a single image; colorful landscape with large tree in center image; orange and yellow leaves on tree; lake with pale blue water on right image, with single figure, a soldier, wearing a blue coat, stands at edge of water; reflection of soldier in water; another soldier with same blue coat and uniform stands with two horses on left, on a grassy hill; faint, shadowed trees in background
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Picture of First Army Scouts Reconnoitering at Motianling
